means: 在这个范围，到这种程度

sentence.Network_en: Looking back helps insofar as it helps you learn from your mistakes.
sentence.Network_cn: 审视过去的作用是能帮你从错误中吸取教训。

sentence.Network_en: I shall do what I can insofar as I am able.
sentence.Network_cn: 在力所能及的情况下我将尽力而为.

sentence.Network_en: Insofar as I can say now, I shall come.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前我只能说我将会来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 阅读版2010年2月美文：10 Strange Facts... ... ) renounce 断绝关系 ) insofar 只要……，在…范围内 ) monstrosity 怪物，畸形.
CISA 词汇汇编 - 豆丁网 ... inherently adv. 天性地,固有地 Insofar 在···范围内 instability n. 不稳定,不稳固.
疯狂英语珍藏版下载 01 I Have a... ... 8、inalienable a. 不可剥夺的 9、insofar ad. 在这个范围 10、vault n. （银行等）金库.
大学英语精读单词表(第五册) - 豆丁网 ... default vi. 疏怠职责， 缺席， 拖欠 insofar ad. 在…的范围 obligation n. 义务， 责任.

list.abs: All is in Divine Order insofar as the return of Earth to Light ., 全部是在神圣秩序里如同地球返回到光里那样.
however , insofar as the government supports the sector , it wants this support to be explicit and limited – unlike the quo .然而，就政府对该行业的支持而言，它希望这种支持是明确而有限的——与目前的现状不同。
gmat单词 ... insidiousa. 祸害隐伏的 insofar as 在...的限度内,在...的范围内 insomnian. 失眠,失眠症.
有用词组 - 小魔女的日志 -... ... In relation to 关于，和…有关 Insofar as 在…限度内，在…范围内，到…程度 For instance 例如.
I will follow the WIPO process insofar as the order of speakers is concerned .在发言顺序方面,我将按照WIPO的程序办理。

sentences.sentence: "insofar as it can be ascertained, the horse lung is comparable to that of man"

auth_sentence.content: The Old Testament made sense only insofar as it prefigured Christianity.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Old Testament made sense only insofar as it prefigured Christianity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Old Testament made sense only insofar as it prefigured Christianity.

auth_sentence.content: His expression, insofar as he had one, reflected concentration.
auth_sentence.res_content: His expression, insofar as he had one, reflected concentration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His expression, insofar as he had one, reflected concentration.

auth_sentence.content: Ultimately it will be over the economy insofar as our voting system allows.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ultimately it will be over the economy insofar as our voting system allows.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ultimately it will be over the economy insofar as our voting system allows.

sentences.en: I’ll help you insofar as I can.
